archdesc.scopecontent: Explores the life of one of America's greatest chemical industrialists from his early days, to his failed efforts at starting businesses, to the eventual creation of The Dow Chemical Company. Includes interviews with historians, family members and Dow employees, as well as rare photographs and never-before-seen archival footage.
